backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining the BizForge AI backend with six query functions (generateBrandNames, generateLogoConcept, generateMarketingContent, analyzeSentiment, generateColorPalette, askChatbot) that return hardcoded stub data.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting the implementation of the expanded 10-variant logo showcase in LogoConceptGenerator, mapping feature requirements to the relevant frontend source files.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON file containing one-sentence summaries of every frontend source file, serving as a quick reference for the purpose and contents of each component, hook, and utility.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base CSS file defining OKLCH-based CSS custom properties for light and dark color themes including background, foreground, card, sidebar, and chart tokens.
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML entry point for the Vite/React app, mounting the React root into a div and loading the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that manages active tool state and renders AppLayout with a ToolView switcher that maps ToolId values to the corresponding tool components.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main layout shell combining the Sidebar, a hero header with background image and BizForge AI badge, a scrollable main content area, and a footer with caffeine.ai attribution.
frontend/src/components/layout/Sidebar.t: Responsive sidebar navigation component with BizForge AI branding, icon-based nav items for all six tools, gold active-state highlighting, and mobile overlay toggle support.
frontend/src/components/tools/BrandingCh: A chat interface component that lets users ask branding and marketing questions, with support for speech-to-text input, suggested questions, and structured AI responses via the useAskChatbot hook.
frontend/src/components/tools/BrandNameG: A React component that provides a form for generating 15 unique brand names based on industry, keywords, and tone, displaying results as copyable badges using the useGenerateBrandNames hook.
frontend/src/components/tools/ColorPalet: A React component that generates a branded color palette based on industry and tone inputs, displaying clickable color swatches with hex codes and emotional meanings via the useGenerateColorPalette hook.
frontend/src/components/tools/LogoConcep: A React component that generates logo concepts from brand name, industry, and tone inputs, rendering multiple SVG logo variants with download-to-PNG functionality using useGenerateLogoConcept and useLogoRenderer hooks.
frontend/src/components/tools/MarketingC: A React component that generates marketing copy including social media captions and ad content based on brand name, product description, target audience, and tone, with copyable content blocks via the useGenerateMarketingContent hook.
frontend/src/components/tools/SentimentA: A React component that provides a UI for analyzing customer review sentiment (positive, negative, neutral) by calling the backend via the useAnalyzeSentiment hook, with example reviews and styled result display.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: A custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using React Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides an InternetIdentityProvider and useInternetIdentity hook for managing ICP Internet Identity authentication state, including login, logout, and identity persistence via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useLogoRenderer.ts: A utility hook that maps logo concept text (icon shape, font style) to SVG primitives and CSS font properties, enabling client-side logo rendering from AI-generated LogoConcept data.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Exports React Query mutation hooks for all backend AI features: brand name generation, logo concept, marketing content, sentiment analysis, color palette, and chatbot queries.
A custom hook wrapping the Web Speech API to provide start/stop recording, transcript capture, error handling, and browser support detection for speech-to-text functionality.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports fonts, configures Tailwind, defines dark/light CSS custom properties (OKLCH color tokens including gold accents), and adds utility classes for gradients, glows, and animations.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Exports a single cn utility function that merges Tailwind CSS class names using clsx and tailwind-merge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the frontend, extending the default theme with custom fonts (Outfit, Inter), oklch-based color tokens, border radius, box shadows, and keyframe animations. Includes plugins for typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Project state manifest for BizForge AI, documenting the current version, feature list with IDs and requirements, architectural notes, and known issues for the AI-powered branding and marketing platform.
